actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the appointment of a special prosecutor for offenses against the United States arising out of the 1972 Presidential campaign.

summary.text: Provides for the appointment by the Chief Judge of the U.S. Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia of a special prosecutor for offenses against the United States arising out of the 1972 Presidential campaign.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the appointment of a special prosecutor for offenses against the United States arising out of the 1972 Presidential campaign.
